title: Efficacy and safety of Chinese patent medicine combined with 5-aminosalicylic acid for patients with ulcerative colitis: A network meta-analysis of randomized controlled trials
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Mingkuan Zhang, Yuan Su, Qian Gao, Miaomiao Zhou, Ying Xing, Zhibin Chen, Xiaoyu Liu, Zifa Li, Xiwen Geng, Guimao Cao, Hao Zhang, Sheng Wei
